titles.title: Nationwide Freight and Personal Mobility Act
Nationwide Freight and Personal Mobility Act
A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to improve highway transportation in the Untied States, including rural and metropolitan areas.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Nationwide Freight and Personal Mobility Act - Specifies a formula for the automatic authorization of additional appropriations for National Highway System (NHS) improvement projects, starting FY2010, if apportionments fall below a certain level.
Revises the federal share of non-Interstate highway projects to make it: (1) 80% for non-NHS projects; and (2) 85% for NHS projects.
